name: Altar of the Bound Deity
text: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Place 1 Earthbound Immortal Counter on this card for each face-up Defense Position monster on the field. You can send this card with 4 or more Earthbound Immortal Counters to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Earthbound Immortal" monster from your Deck.
